name: job-tracker-automations
description: Automated job application tracker using Gmail, Google Sheets, and Discord

scripts.deploy:email: gcloud functions deploy processEmail --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --entry-point processEmail --source . --region us-central1 --main dist/main-processEmail.js
scripts.deploy:summary: gcloud functions deploy dailySummary --gen2 --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --entry-point dailySummary --source . --region us-central1 --main dist/main-dailySummary.js
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:email && npm run deploy:summary
